subject: Test Email for Inbox
content: U.K.-based web designer Purplefeather created the powerful Change Your Words, Change Your World video. In it, a four-word plea (I’m blind. Please help.) is changed into a nine-word sentence (It’s a beautiful day and I can’t see it). The text transformation generates far more compassion. Since its 2010 debut, the video has been viewed over 24.7 million times and received thousands of comments on YouTube.
